title: Beautiful1 Bedroom+1 Bath In A New Luxury Building – Fully Furnished
map_address: 2651 S. Hobart Blvd. near Adams Blvd.
posting_body: 1 Bedroom + 1 Bath In A New Luxury Building – Fully Furnished
Offering fully furnished Units in a NEW LUXURY BUILDING with flexible leases
This is a Brand New Building that was completed in Late 2019.
The unit can be rented as a whole for $5600 ( Fully Furnished With All Utilities Included ) or as Private Furnished Rooms with prices starting at $1250
The available units each have 4 bedrooms & 3 bathrooms in a 2 story Condo style setting with high ceilings and underground parking.
This property is very conveniently located in Mid-City just south of Korea-Town near Adams Blvd & Western Ave with quick access to the 10 Frwy.
Only minutes away from Downtown, USC Campus, Hollywood, Korea town, Mid-Wilshire area, Culver City and Santa Monica.
Major supermarkets shops & restaurant are only minutes away.
ABOUT THE UNIT:
•	 Central AC / Heating
•	Washer/dryer
•	Queen size bed in each room
•	Elegant kitchen equipped with Stainless Steel appliances
•	Modern Italian cabinetry and everything needed for cooking with plenty of space to cook & relax.
•	55 inch Smart tv.
•	High speed Wi-Fi
•	Netflix
•	Designer furniture and fully furnished bedrooms.
•	A professional cleaning service is also provided in order to maintain a clean environment for all individuals
•	ALL UTILITIES ARE INCLUDED
The property has plenty of underground parking and is completely secured with 16 cameras around the property monitoring all activities 24/7
